tool_description: Calculates total debt obligations, debt-to-income ratios, and monthly payment requirements from various debt sources.

auto_loan_payments.description: Array of monthly auto loan payments

other_debt_payments.description: Array of other monthly debt payments

error_messages: Invalid income amount: Monthly gross income must be positive
Array length mismatch: Auto loan balances and payments arrays must have same length
Array length mismatch: Credit card balances and limits arrays must have same length
Negative values not allowed: All debt amounts and payments must be non-negative
Credit utilization error: Credit card balance cannot exceed credit limit
usage: Provide monthly_gross_income and relevant debt information arrays. All debt parameters are optional. Returns comprehensive debt analysis and ratio calculations.

total_monthly_debt_payments.description: Sum of all monthly debt payment obligations

debt_to_income_ratio.description: Total monthly debt payments divided by gross monthly income

total_outstanding_debt.description: Sum of all outstanding debt balances

debt_risk_category.description: Risk assessment category (low, moderate, high, excessive)
